description: This file contains utility functions related to telemetry, including memory management for various data structures, comparison functions, and device property retrieval for telemetry purposes within a larger C project.

methods.name: void freeParam(void * data)
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for a Param structure and its string members.

methods.name: void freeStaticParam(void * data)
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for a StaticParam structure and its string members.

methods.name: void freeEMarker(void * data)
methods.description: Frees memory associated with an EventMarker structure, including nested allocated members.

methods.name: void freeAccumulatedParam(void * data)
methods.description: Frees a string used as an accumulated parameter.

methods.name: void freeGMarker(void * data)
methods.description: Frees memory related to a GrepMarker structure, including its string members.

methods.name: int compareLogFileNames(const void * g1,const void * g2)
methods.description: Comparator function for GrepMarker pointers to sort by log file name.

methods.name: void freeTriggerCondition(void * data)
methods.description: Frees memory associated with a TriggerCondition structure and its members.

methods.name: bool getDevicePropertyData(const char * dev_prop_name,char * out_data,unsigned int buff_size)
methods.description: Reads a device property value from the device.property file into provided buffer.

ctags.name: getDevicePropertyData
ctags.pattern: /^bool getDevicePropertyData(const char *dev_prop_name, char *out_data, unsigned int buff_size)$/
